SOME PLAYER REVIEWS

★★★★★ “Funny, I like the sounds the flies make, oooh and the sword sounds is pretty sweet, check it out” – Liam Alton (Oct 2012)
★★★★★ “Pretty good fun, quick to play. Reminds me of fruit ninja, but instead of fruit splats its blood splats :p” – Homie323 (Oct 2012)


Don't you just hate flies and bee ‘s. Doesn't it just drive you crazy when they buzz around your head for hours on end. Well its time to get your sword out and do some wing cutting in Super Bug Killer : Fly Slice.

Slice and slash fly after fly and bee after bee in this super fun and super easy game. Splat their tiny wings everywhere. Similar in style to fruit ninja and fruit slice - just swipe the screen to take care of those annoying bug ‘s. But dont kill the cute lady bugs, they are just too cute.


HOW TO PLAY

This games controls are so easy. Just touch the screen with one finger and swipe your sword. Slice the tiny flies and bee ‘s and stop them reaching the other side of the screen. Don’t slice any of the cute lady bugs or its game over. Score as high as possible.
When you kill a bee you get bee credits which can be used to increase your score multiplier. Each score multiplier grade costs 5 bees.


Now go slice them flies and bee ‘s ninja style : )
The Cobalt Play Games Team
